peril.views.slick.components

Class ScrollBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.components.ScrollBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public final class ScrollBar
extends Clickable
implements Component
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a ScrollBar.
    Since:
    2018-02-27
    Version:
    1.02.03
    Author:
    Ezekiel_Trinidad, Joshua_Eddy, Joseph_Rolli
    See Also:
    Clickable, Component

      Whether or not the numbers are displayed next to the ScrollBar.

      The ScrollBar.Slider that moves along this ScrollBar.

      The spacing between each position on the ScrollBar.
